Script.Name: Remove useless apps
Supprimer les applications inutiles
Script.Description: Dozens of useless application packages are installed by default. Removing them frees up disk space. The following app packages will be removed from your system: - 3D Builder - 3D Viewer - Actipro Software LLC - Adobe Photoshop Express - Asphalt 8: Airborne - Autodesk SketchBook - Bing Finance - Bing Sports - Bing Weather - Camera - Candy Crush - Cartes - Chat (Microsoft Teams) - Connectivity Store - Drawboard PDF - Duolingo - Eclipse Manager - Facebook - Fallout Shelter - FarmVille 2 Country Escape - Feedback hub - Films et TV - Flipboard - Groove Music - Microsoft Adverstising XAML - Microsoft Messaging - Microsoft News - Microsoft OneConnect - Microsoft Solitaire Collection - Microsoft Sticky Notes - Microsoft To Do - Microsoft Wallet - Minecraft - Netflix - Network Speed Test - Office Hub - Office Sway - One Note - Paint 3D - Pandora Media Inc - People - Phone - Print 3D - Royal Revolt 2 - Skype - Snip & Sketch - Spotify - Twitter - Voice recorder - Windows Clock - Windows Phone - Windows Scan - Wunderlist - Xbox - Xbox Game Bar - Xbox Identity Provider - Xbox One Smart Glass - Xbox Speed To Text Overlay - Your Phone

Plusieurs dizaines de packages d'application inutiles sont installés par défaut. Les supprimer libère de l'epace disque. Les packages d'application suivants seront supprimés : - 3D Builder - Actipro Software LLC - Adobe Photoshop Express - Alarmes et horloge - Asphalt8: Airborne - Autodesk SketchBook - Bing Finance - Bing Sports - Caméra - Candy Crush - Capture et croquis - Cartes - Chat (Microsoft Teams) - Connectivity Store - Drawboard PDF - Duolingo - Eclipse Manager - Enregistreur vocal - Facebook - Fallout Shelter - FarmVille 2 Country Escape - Films et TV - Flipboard - Groove Music - Hub de commentaires - Imprimer en 3D - Messagerie - Météo - Microsoft Adverstising XAML - Microsoft News - Microsoft OneConnect - Microsoft Solitaire Collection - Microsoft Sticky Notes - Microsoft To Do - Microsoft Wallet - Minecraft - Netflix - Network Speed Test - Office Hub - Office Sway - One Note - Paint 3D - Pandora Media Inc - People - Phone - Royal Revolt 2 - Skype - Spotify - Twitter - Visionneuse 3D - Votre téléphone - Windows Phone - Windows Scan - Wunderlist - Xbox - Xbox Game Bar - Xbox Identity Provider - Xbox One Smart Glass - Xbox Speed To Text Overlay

Code.Execute: # Based on https://github.com/Sycnex/Windows10Debloater/blob/master/Individual%20Scripts/Debloat%20Windows/ Import-Module Appx Import-Module DISM $AppXApps = @( "*ActiproSoftwareLLC*" "*AdobeSystemsIncorporated.AdobePhotoshopExpress*" "*AutodeskSketchBook*" "*BethesdaSoftworks.FalloutShelter*" "*bingsports*" "*CandyCrush*" "*CommsPhone*" "*ConnectivityStore*" "*Duolingo-LearnLanguagesforFree*" "*EclipseManager*" "*Facebook*" "*FarmVille2CountryEscape*" "*flaregamesGmbH.RoyalRevolt2*" "*Flipboard*" "*Microsoft.3dbuilder*" "*Microsoft.Advertising*" "*Microsoft.Asphalt8Airborne*" "*Microsoft.BingFinance*" "*Microsoft.BingNews*" "*Microsoft.BingWeather*" "*Microsoft.DrawboardPDF*" "*Microsoft.Messaging*" "*Microsoft.Microsoft3DViewer*" "*Microsoft.MicrosoftOfficeHub*" "*Microsoft.MicrosoftSolitaireCollection*" "*Microsoft.MicrosoftStickyNotes*" "*Microsoft.MSPaint*" "*Microsoft.NetworkSpeedTest*" "*Microsoft.Office.Sway*" "*Microsoft.OneConnect*" "*Microsoft.People*" "*Microsoft.Print3D*" "*Microsoft.ScreenSketch*" "*Microsoft.SkypeApp*" "*Microsoft.Wallet*" "*Microsoft.WindowsAlarms*" "*Microsoft.WindowsCamera*" "*microsoft.windowscommunicationsapps*" "*Microsoft.WindowsFeedbackHub*" "*Microsoft.WindowsMaps*" "*Microsoft.WindowsSoundRecorder*" "*Microsoft.Xbox.TCUI*" "*Microsoft.XboxApp*" "*Microsoft.XboxGameOverlay*" "*Microsoft.XboxIdentityProvider*" "*Microsoft.XboxSpeechToTextOverlay*" "*Microsoft.YourPhone*" "*Microsoft.ZuneMusic*" "*Microsoft.ZuneVideo*" "*Microsoft3DViewer*" "*MicrosoftTeams*" "*MinecraftUWP*" "*Netflix*" "*OneNote*" "*PandoraMediaInc*" "*Spotify*" "*Todos*" "*Twitter*" "*windowsphone*" "*WindowsScan*" "*Wunderlist*" "*XboxOneSmartGlass*" ) foreach ($App in $AppXApps) { Get-AppxPackage -Name $App -AllUsers | Remove-AppxPackage -AllUsers -ErrorAction Continue Get-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online | Where-Object DisplayName -like $App | Remove-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online -ErrorAction Continue }
